_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Jellyfin
author: Matheusn.biolowons@gmail.com
description:
💎 Egg: Jellyfin
⚙️ Version: 2.3
❓ What it is: in short, you can have your own Netflix. Jellyfin allows you to collect, manage, and stream your media. Run the Jellyfin server on your system and gain access to the leading free software entertainment system.
🐛 Bug fixes/changelogs:
• 2.2: Now the Egg is not dependent on updates, everything is done via scripts, resulting in better maintenance.
• 2.3: Added new Docker versions
⚠️ Attention: If a Select Server screen appears on the first startup, delete the existing server there, and reload the page.
👑 Author: Ashu
👀 Check for updates: [https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs](https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs)

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y curl wget unzip git tar ca-certificates jq
mkdir -p logs
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server || exit
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect/en/Jellyfin/install.sh)
